mapper.select: SELECT A.HOME_CODE, A.MDATE, A.PRODUCT_TYPE, A.MODEL_GROUP, A.COOLHIGHTEMP_AD, A.COOLLOWTEMP_AD, A.HEATLOWTEMP_AD, A.HEATHIGHTEMP_AD, A.ROOMTEMP_AD, A.DEFROSTTEMP_AD, A.OUTTEMP_AD, A.FANOUTRPM, A.FANFEEDBACKRPM, A.LITER, A.HUMIDITY, A.ROOMTEMP, A.DEFROSTTEMP, A.OUTTEMP, A.CHANGESTEP, A.MAINMODEINDEX, A.SUBMODEINDEX, A.LEAKCOUNT, A.REFRESHTIMER, A.ERRORCODE, A.MOTIONSENSOR, A.DOOROPEN, A.POWER, A.COMP, A.DRAINHEATER, A.DEFROSTHEATER, A.LAMP, A.RDATE FROM TBL_REFRIGERATOR A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REFRIGERATOR( HOME_CODE, MDATE, PRODUCT_TYPE, MODEL_GROUP, COOLHIGHTEMP_AD, COOLLOWTEMP_AD, HEATLOWTEMP_AD, HEATHIGHTEMP_AD, ROOMTEMP_AD, DEFROSTTEMP_AD, OUTTEMP_AD, FANOUTRPM, FANFEEDBACKRPM, LITER, HUMIDITY, ROOMTEMP, DEFROSTTEMP, OUTTEMP, CHANGESTEP, MAINMODEINDEX, SUBMODEINDEX, LEAKCOUNT, REFRESHTIMER, ERRORCODE, MOTIONSENSOR, DOOROPEN, POWER, COMP, DRAINHEATER, DEFROSTHEATER, LAMP, RDATE ) VALUES ( #{home_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{mdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model_group}, #{coolhightemp_ad}, #{coollowtemp_ad}, #{heatlowtemp_ad}, #{heathightemp_ad}, #{roomtemp_ad}, #{defrosttemp_ad}, #{outtemp_ad}, #{fanoutrpm}, #{fanfeedbackrpm}, #{liter}, #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomtemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defrosttemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outtemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changestep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainmodeindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submodeindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leakcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refreshtimer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motionsensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dooropen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drainheater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defrostheater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{rdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
